blunt.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: speaking in an honest way even if this upsets people
blunt.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: To be blunt, many of the candidates cannot read or write.
blunt.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to make a feeling less strong
blunt.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The bad weather blunted their enthusiasm for camping.
blunt.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to make the point of a pencil or the edge of a knife less sharp
